document.full_text: france telecom is unlikely to merge its mobile operations with those of deutsche telekom in other markets in the way it has done in britain, the head of its european operations said on wednesday.
document.title: orange sees more t-mobile mergers as unlikely
lines_and_colors: france telecom is unlikely to merge its mobile operations with those of deutsche telekom in other markets in the way it has done in britain, the head of its european operations said on wednesday.
